pageContent: Objective: To investigate the effect of hypofractionated external beam radiation therapy (RT) on sexual function in patients treated for localized prostate cancer, and also to determine the effect of radiation dose to the penile bulb or crura of the corpus cavernosum on sexual function outcome.

metaData.source:
Patient-reported sexual toxicity after radiation therapy in long-term prostate cancer survivors
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/26241816/
